_aChangeLog.text: Fixed Teleporter Item so it teleports the user only.
Introduced new Stage ULTIMATE. Now Map has 7 stages in total.
Added New Hiding Spots and holds for humans.
Shield Item can now push zombies back.

_sText:
**This is an improved version of the beta version of this Map ze_eerie_escape_b1**

Map Contains:

5 Stages + Zombie Mode. (6 Total)
Stage-1: STATIC
Stage-2: SONIC
Stage-3: HYPER
Stage-4: DIMENSIONAL
Stage-5: BACKROOMS

Map Also Contains Items (3 for Humans, 3 for Zombies)

Human Items

  • Tecquila Shotgun
  • EERIE Shield
  • Teleporter

Zombie Items
  • Zombie Killer
  • Zombie Lure
  • Zombie Laser

Map Info:Â 
On First 4 Stages, Humans have to survive 100 seconds, then they will be teleported to final destination and dodge the Lasers. (3 Stages contains Lasers and 4th has Cube RNG). 5th Stage is based on the game Backrooms. A small but fun stage. And really difficult if Teamwork isn't utilized.
6th is simply Zombie Stage. Just to chill! Overall Map is made for fun and doesn't contain any real tryhard.

NOTE
**If Map contains bugs, just inform me. You are not allowed to edit and re-upload this map.**
